name: 96.7FM
description:
I don't know what happened that night. Maybe my radio was possessed, maybe I was haunted, maybe I was transported to another dimension. Whatever happened, I'll never forget that frequency number.

Portland, 96.7FM.

Based on a true story.

I made this game to push the limits of my Unity development skills. It took weeks and some very messy scripting, but I now have a finished project I can call my own. Have fun!

Best suited for 16:9 monitors.

Here's a video explaining the real events that inspired this game:
